0: Thanks to our horrible experience with this hotel I doubt I would ever take my family back to Honolulu ever again
Loved the cold drinks provided in the foyer great when you come back from a shopping are tourist trip
If not late check out they can hold the luggage for you so that you can check out and go around town to enjoy the last day and maximize the trip
Not luxury but really clean and comfy we do not spend much time in the hotel room on holidays so was perfect for us
Thank you Shoreline Hotel for a great holiday
The front desk took the liberty to wake my parents first without success before calling us to go and get my parents
Would definetly stay here again and recommend to family and friends
Stella on reception was very friendly and provided great advice for best trips to take
Excellent hotel to enjoy Waikiki vacation
1: We needed a quick stay and we know the local area well so we did not need a nicer hotel but I would be a little irritated if I had come all the way there for a dream Hawaii vacation to stay in an old place like this

We got a great price through Hotelscom which included taxes for the hotel paid this in full prior to our holiday but when we arrived at the hotel they requested our credit card details for a security deposit of 100
but then again maybe that was a good thing to be disconnected on vacation
2: I will definitely be looking to stay here again if I make it back to Honolulu a long trip from the UK but so worth it what a beautiful place
A family member had a medical emergency while at the hotel
Room size was a bit small for a family
They were able to check us in to one of our groups rooms until the other room became available
It was a great vacation for me my 2 daughters
If I were planning the trip again knowing what I know now I had definitely be up for staying here again
He had to replace a whole part in the ac and instead of making us move to another room fixed it as quickly as he could and the family slept great
do yourself a favor and book it on your next trip to WAKIKI
On our first full day in the hotel we returned from an outing only to find our room cards had been deactivated
We only had two days in Waikiki and it was at the front end of our trip
